definitions: in a negative way, especially by expressing denial, disagreement, or refusal

examples.text: 53 percent of Americans view her negatively, compared to 40 percent favorably
investors reacted negatively to the news

definitions: in a way that indicates absence of a certain substance or condition

examples.text: women who originally tested negatively for the hepatitis C virus

shortDefinitions: in way that indicates absence of certain substance or condition

definitions: in a way that is not desirable or optimistic

examples.text: traffic congestion had impacted negatively on their business

shortDefinitions: in way that is not desirable or optimistic
